00162   void add_stock( int amount ) {
00163     if(amount < reserve) {
00164       stock += amount;
00165       reserve -= amount;
00166     }
00167     else {
00168       stock += reserve;
00169       reserve = 0;
00170     }
00171   }
00172 
00176   void remove_stock(int remove) {
00177     stock -= remove;
00178 
00179     if(stock < 0) stock = 0;
00180   }
00181
